languages.text: On getting hit by an attack, wielder's Shield gains +5% Block Chance until the end of round. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: On getting hit by an attack, wielder's Shield gains +5% Block Chance until the end of round. Stacks up to 3 times.

languages.text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
languages.original_text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, когда он получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} (множественные попадания {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}в очереди{/g} считаются за одно), щит получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блоку{/g}. Суммируется до 3 раз и длится до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is hit (multiple hits in a burst are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% block. Stacks up to 3 times and lasts until the end of round.

If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% block. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% block. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% block. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, kalkan kuşanmışsa {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırıdaki{/g} birden çok vuruş tek vuruş sayılır) kalkan +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} değeri kazanır. Etkisi {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, kalkan kuşanmışsa {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırıdaki{/g} birden çok vuruş tek vuruş sayılır) kalkan +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} değeri kazanır. Etkisi {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.

Giyen kişi, kalkan kuşanmışsa vurulduğunda (seri saldırıdaki birden çok vuruş tek vuruş sayılır) kalkan +%5 bloklama değeri kazanır. Etkisi {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cada vez que reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} (una {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} de múltiples impactos se considera un solo impacto), el escudo gana un +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqueo{/g}. Este efecto dura hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y puede acumularse un máximo de 3 veces.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cada vez que reciba un impacto (una ráfaga de múltiples impactos se considera un solo impacto), el escudo gana un +5 % de bloqueo. Este efecto dura hasta el final del asalto y puede acumularse un máximo de 3 veces.

Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cada vez que reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} (una {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} de múltiples impactos se considera un solo impacto), el escudo gana un +5 % de bloqueo. Este efecto dura hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y puede acumularse un máximo de 3 veces.

languages.text: 如果装备者装备了盾牌，则每当装备者被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时（被{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击多次命中时，视为单次命中），盾牌的{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}几率都会提高5%。此效果最多可叠加3层，持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者装备了盾牌，则每当装备者被命中时（被连发攻击多次命中时，视为单次命中），盾牌的格挡几率都会提高5%。此效果最多可叠加3层，持续至本轮结束。
如果装备者装备了盾牌，则每当装备者被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时（被{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击多次命中时，视为单次命中），盾牌的格挡几率都会提高5%。此效果最多可叠加3层，持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。

languages.text: Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, erhält dieser bei jedem erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} (mehrere Treffer bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g} zählen als ein Treffer) +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocken{/g}. Hält bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} an. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, erhält dieser bei jedem erlittenen Treffer (mehrere Treffer bei einer Salve zählen als ein Treffer) +5 % Blocken. Hält bis zum Ende der Runde an. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.

Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, erhält dieser bei jedem erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} (mehrere Treffer bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g} zählen als ein Treffer) +5 % Blocken. Hält bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} an. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.

Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, erhält dieser bei jedem erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} (mehrere Treffer bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g} zählen als ein Treffer) +5 % Blocken. Hält bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} an. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.

languages.text: Si le porteur est équipé d'un bouclier, lorsqu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} par un coup (une attaque comportant {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}plusieurs coups{/g} est considérée comme un seul coup), le bouclier gagne +5 % au {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocage{/g}. Dure jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Si le porteur est équipé d'un bouclier, lorsqu'il est touché par un coup (une attaque comportant plusieurs coups est considérée comme un seul coup), le bouclier gagne +5 % au blocage. Dure jusqu'à la fin du round. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.

Si le porteur est équipé d'un bouclier, lorsqu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} par un coup (une attaque comportant {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}plusieurs coups{/g} est considérée comme un seul coup), le bouclier gagne +5 % au blocage. Dure jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.

Si le porteur est équipé d'un bouclier, lorsqu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} par un coup (une attaque comportant {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}plusieurs coups{/g} est considérée comme un seul coup), le bouclier gagne +5 % au blocage. Dure jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.

languages.text: 使用者がシールドを装備している場合、使用者が {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}されると（{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト攻撃{/g}による複数ヒットは1つとする）、シールド{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}が+5%される。{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}終了まで継続する。最大3回までスタックする。
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がシールドを装備している場合、使用者が攻撃されると（爆発による複数ヒットは1つとする）、シールドブロックが+5%される。ラウンド終了まで継続する。最大3回までスタックする。
使用者がシールドを装備している場合、使用者が攻撃されると（爆発による複数ヒットは1つとする）、シールドブロックが+5%される。ラウンド終了まで継続する。最大3回までスタックする。

languages.text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, когда он получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} (множественные попадания {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}в очереди{/g} считаются за одно), щит получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блоку{/g}. Суммируется до 3 раз и длится до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, когда он получает попадание (множественные попадания в очереди считаются за одно), щит получает +5% к блоку. Суммируется до 3 раз и длится до конца раунда.
Если у персонажа в руке щит, когда он получает попадание (множественные попадания в очереди считаются за одно), щит получает +5% к блоку. Суммируется до 3 раз и длится до конца раунда.
